body: It's women that like NTR you idiots. You don't have to be a genius to get this. And judging them for it is peak hypocrisy, considering you're all on this site.

To think that people actually like netorare makes me wonder, why?????? Do people who watch/read/played the manga/anime/game not just of kanokon, but of any mainstream show out there, enjoy seeing the predefined written romantic relationships of the show's characters broken? I mean, I can get that certain canon pairings were not to your liking. But in this case for example,  Kanokon is always about the protag and his waifus (besides some secondary plot for other characters). WHY on EARTH would you keep watching the series and then want to see something that is THE COMPLETE OPPOSITE of what the series is supposed to be about? Usually I'd think this is just a minor fetish with few people into it, BUT NO. There's TONS of netorare out there with AWFULLY WELL DRAWN characters of ANY KIND. WHYYYYYYYYY,,,,, WHY DO YOU WANT TO SEE THIS SHIT WHY I DON'T GET IT MAN WHY
